text:
Optimizing PNGs would save some space without any loss of functionality I'm aware of, for example OptiPNG 0.7.4 would shave ~16% off them in total for current trunk:

$ find . -name "*.png" | xargs du -bc | tail -n 1
685147	total
$ find . -name "*.png" | xargs -n4 -P4 optipng -q -o7
$ find . -name "*.png" | xargs du -bc | tail -n 1
577135	total
creator: ville.skytta@iki.fi
